sentences.sContent: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.sCn: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

sentences.sContent: ...This is really about trying to cut through the confusion that consumers have when they are buying a product and that businesses have when they are selling a product...

phrases.pCn: 乱七八糟；处于混乱状态
打乱；使陷入混乱；使…惊慌失措

words.tran: 混乱的；混淆的；令人困惑的
可能被混淆的；可能被弄糊涂的
混乱地；受困惑地；慌乱地
使迷惑；使混乱不清；使困窘（confuse的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 困惑， 糊涂； 混淆； 骚乱
trans.tranOther: when you do not understand what is happening or what something means because it is not clear
